title: Tiffany Haddish, Logo Changes, Michael Cohen, Tiger Woods and more.
itunes:title: Tiffany Haddish, Logo Changes, Michael Cohen, Tiger Woods and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! For the second day in a row, The Earl of Ottingham is back and somebody's about to vomit. Tommy has some mask related pick up lines. Tiffany Haddish sets the record straight about her hair. Fool #2 has logos that can use some change. There is more controversy regarding the Breonna Taylor case. The Mayor of New York is a painter as well. Will the Washington Redskins get a new name? Michael Cohen refuses to sign. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog points out the obvious about Black Lives Matter, Trump and more leading into November's election.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
